Andre and Jeanne can not affect the presence of the "guest" who took a room on top dead parents of Jeanne. Therefore the owners of the house protesting the only way possible - silence. They do not talk with Werner and do not answer his questions. However, the silence of Jeanne fraught with not only dislike of the stranger ...
